execution_quality: Clean execution with proper messaging protocol. Teammate sent structured confirmation, received shutdown approval, and exited cleanly without errors.
work_category: Team coordination message - validator teammate provided confirmation report on spec document accuracy, then gracefully shut down.
summary: Validator teammate successfully communicated spec confirmation findings via structured messaging and cleanly terminated when requested. No work was actually performed (no file modifications), but the communication protocol was executed correctly as part of a larger team coordination task.
follow_up_pattern: Task coordinator (team lead) receiving validator confirmation before proceeding with next validation steps or wrapping up review cycle.
